column1: NGR is Knowbury vicarage but the altitude is just over 900 ft. not 1000. Symons put a question mark against the altitude of 1000 ft. in his 1874 British Rainfall report. The observer Rev J Burleigh James was a well known collector of fine arts and all references to him say he lived at Knowbury Park, I can find no other references to Knowbury Park.
